review: We are very happy with "all" that it supplies to us.  BUT we find that it is extremely easy to rent or Buy PRIME movies that we had not intended to purchase.  Today our daughter came to visit and put a password in so it is more difficult to purchase or rent something.  I would recommend this for every one who gets the fire stick and I would recommend Amazon to make this an easy access for all who purchase the Fire Stick.
author: cathy fichera
